short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows to natively specify shortcuts for basic navigation in Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension allows to natively specify shortcuts for basic navigation in Chrome:
 - Switch to previous/next tab
 - Go back/forward

1. Open source
2. Uses native shortcuts manager for extensions in Chrome
3. Almost no-code extension (less than 50 lines)
4. Pure and clean
